languages.text: {n}Мастер печатей недовольно цокает.{/n} "Быть может, наследни{mf|к|ца} протектората и не жалеет своего языка, раз готов{mf||а} заболтать его до мозолей. Но я, презренная слуга Императора, лишена такого блага, как свободное время. Перейдем к сути вашего запроса".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер печатей недовольно цокает.{/n} "Быть может, наследни{mf|к|ца} торговой империи и не жалеет своего языка, раз готов{mf||а} заболтать его до мозолей. Но я, презренная слуга Императора, лишена такого блага, как свободное время. Перейдем к сути вашего запроса".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер печатей недовольно цокает.{/n} "Быть может, наследни{mf|к|ца} протектората и не жалеет своего языка, раз готов{mf||а} заболтать его до мозолей. Но я, презренная слуга Императора, лишена такого блага, как свободное время. Перейдем к сути вашего запроса".

However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."

However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}印章大师不满地咂咂嘴。{/n}“这话要是别被人听到了，他们可能会觉得王朝的继承人整天游手好闲，想到什么就随口问什么，时间多得简直不知道该干些什么才好。不过，我仅仅是帝皇谦卑的仆人而已，在浪费时间这方面并没有什么天赋。我们还是继续讨论你的申请吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章大师不满地咂咂嘴。{/n}“这话要是别被人听到了，他们可能会觉得王朝的继承人整天游手好闲，想到什么就随口问什么，时间多得简直不知道该干些什么才好。不过，我仅仅是帝皇谦卑的仆人而已，在浪费时间这方面并没有什么天赋。我们还是继续讨论你的申请吧。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos chasquea la lengua, molesta.{/n} «Cabría pensar que {mf|al|a la} hereder{mf|o|a} del protectorado no le preocupa su lengua con el uso que le da. Sin embargo, como humilde sirvienta del Emperador que soy, no me ha sido concedido el don del tiempo libre. Pasemos al asunto de la certificación».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."

traits.locale_text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos chasquea la lengua, molesta.{/n} «Cabría pensar que {mf|al|a la} hereder{mf|o|a} del protectorado no le preocupa su lengua con el uso que le da. Sin embargo, como humilde sirvienta del Emperador que soy, no me ha sido concedido el don del tiempo libre. Pasemos al asunto de la certificación».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}印章長はがっかりして舌打ちする。{/n}「護民官の後継者が御自分の発言に気をつかわないとは、どこまで仕事をないがしろにしたらそうなるのでしょう。しかしながら、私は皇帝の卑しい信奉者です、自由時間などありません。陛下の申請事項に移りましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章長はがっかりして舌打ちする。{/n}「護民官の後継者が御自分の発言に気をつかわないとは、どこまで仕事をないがしろにしたらそうなるのでしょう。しかしながら、私は皇帝の卑しい信奉者です、自由時間などありません。陛下の申請事項に移りましょう」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse des sceaux rétorque d'un ton irrité :{/n} « Il faut croire que l'{mf|héritier|héritière} du protectorat n'a rien de mieux à faire que de parler pour ne rien dire... Sauf votre respect, nous autres, humbles fonctionnaires au service de l'Empereur, n'avons pas de temps à perdre en bavardages inutiles. Occupons-nous plutôt de votre dossier. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse des sceaux rétorque d'un ton irrité :{/n} « Il faut croire que l'{mf|héritier|héritière} du protectorat n'a rien de mieux à faire que de parler pour ne rien dire... Sauf votre respect, nous autres, humbles fonctionnaires au service de l'Empereur, n'avons pas de temps à perdre en bavardages inutiles. Occupons-nous plutôt de votre dossier. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel verzieht missbilligend das Gesicht.{/n} "Man möchte meinen, {mf|dem Erben|der Erbin} des Protektorats sei nicht an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Zunge gelegen, so freimütig verbrennt {mf|er|sie} sie sich. Ich hingegen, niedere Dienerin des Imperators, verfüge nicht über ungenutzte Zeit. Kommen wir daher zu Eurem Antrag."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel verzieht missbilligend das Gesicht.{/n} "Man möchte meinen, {mf|dem Erben|der Erbin} des Protektorats sei nicht an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Zunge gelegen, so freimütig verbrennt {mf|er|sie} sie sich. Ich hingegen, niedere Dienerin des Imperators, verfüge nicht über ungenutzte Zeit. Kommen wir daher zu Eurem Antrag."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Mühür Üstadı, dudak bükerek cık cık çekiyor.{/n} "Protektoranın vârisinin böylesine zevzeklik etmeye vakti olmasına şaşmamalı. Oysa bendeniz, İmparator'un zavallı bir hizmetkârı olduğum için boşa harcayacak vaktim yok. İzninizle başvurduğunuz meseleye geçelim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals tuts in displeasure.{/n} "One would think the protectorate's heir has no care for {mf|his|her} tongue, if {mf|he|she} is so willing to wag it to the point of blistering. However, I, despised servant of the Emperor that I am, do not possess the gift of unallocated time. Let us proceed to the matter of your application."
